results.content: Yes, the course worked pretty well.  I would have liked a bit more about making the application available on the network for testing, I ran into some issues accessing it via other machines.  Overall though, I got the project working and got some exposure to a wide variety of technologies.

results.content: The instructor was very experienced and explained every topic clearly. Step by step showed the necessary actions. The videos shows each step clearly. You should definitely  take this course if you want to get hands on experience on NodeJS, HapiJS and ReactJS.
results.content_html: The instructor was very experienced and explained every topic clearly. Step by step showed the necessary actions. The videos shows each step clearly. You should definitely take this course if you want to get hands on experience on NodeJS, HapiJS and ReactJS.

results.content:
I am generally quite happy with this course. Evans moved at a great pace and explained most things quite well. I gave it the rating that I did because I felt like he very quickly moved past the installation of python, which I'm a total beginner with. I was getting a ton of errors and didn't resolve them until after about 5 hours of troubleshooting (I was using the default version of Python on my mac and had to install a separate version of Python 3 with homebrew to make everything work). As Python wasn't even the focus of this course (I was looking to learn more about hapi), this was frustrating. 

With all that said, I'm very pleased with the end result and feel like I have a better understanding of how to set up node and hapi (I mostly work on the frontend with React). Thank you for the course!

results.content: I tried to follow the video coding locally in a windows machine but some times the instructor assume or no specify how import/run/get libraries (for example in python section) or maybe the command he was showing is not compatible for windows.
results.content_html: I tried to follow the video coding locally in a windows machine but some times the instructor assume or no specify how import/run/get libraries (for example in python section) or maybe the command he was showing is not compatible for windows.

results.content:
This course was exactly what I was looking for!

I am fairly new to web-application development and I was looking for a course that could point me into a direction of faster & easier web-application development.
This course does all of that and more.

I knew that there is a huge collection of web-frameworks, tools and technologies for developing web-application. For a newbie it is hard to navigate through this jungle & make the right choices. 
I had played little bit around with javascript, html and some webframeworks before. Those solutions where never fast, clean, projects where hard to manage.

The core technologies used and described in this course convinced me that it is possible to create modern web-applications in an elegant way.
The instructor describes many technologies he is using to create a Sentiment Analysis web-application. 

The "learning by doing" approach gave a quick impression about the possibilities and feeded my hunger to learn more about the technologies.

To come to the end-result (Sentiment Analysis web-application) many technologies are being used. Don't be overwhelmed by that. The instructor cannot go into detail of every technology of course.
But he gives enough information so that you can proceed with the course. Besides there are the many references on the net. 
I for one am stimulated to learn more about javascript constructions like promise & arrow-functions.

The instructor proficient, the course is stimulating.

I would recommend it to anyone who wants to know more about web-application development

results.content:
Evans, starts the course by focusing on the very beginning details. Even, later he doesn't consider anything known, but he explains deeply. 
It is a well organized course, especially for starters, but also for those who want to get a better knowledge of the principles in these frameworks.
Following the course, one is able to do a lot of things and go easily to the next level.
Keep up the nice work!

results.content:
Great course to start with, and understand all the basics of nodejs and reactjs!

Evans is experienced on the subject, focuses on details, his course is very easily to grasp, and gets the point across. 
Also, the fact that he encourages questions is great. More instructors should do this.
Thanks!
